snippet: There may be a silver lining to the political cloud over Attorney General Jeff Sessions after his decision to withdraw from any investigation touching the Trump campaign....

headline.main: AP FACT CHECK: Trump's Skewed Ledger of Achievements
headline.print_headline: AP FACT CHECK: Trump's Skewed Ledger of Achievements

lead_paragraph: There may be a silver lining to the political cloud over Attorney General Jeff Sessions after his decision to withdraw from any investigation touching the Trump campaign.
